item.title: AI-Enabled Contact Center Automation: Virtual Agent Collaboration with CRM
item.description:
Integrating HubSpot with SeaX

Easy and seamless access to both your contact center interface and your customer data in a CRM is vital to efficient customer support. In SeaX, Seasalt.aiâ€™s collaborative contact center product, you can facilitate this by integrating a CRM like HubSpot directly into your contact center interface, giving you direct access to all of your information and tools.
